造物主: (ぞうぶつしゅ) - the Creator; Maker
造物所: (つくもどころ) - palace workshop responsible for making furnishings, etc. (Heian period)
造船所: (ぞうせんしょ) - shipyard; dock yard; shipbuilding yard
造花: (ぞうか) - artificial flowers; artificial flower making
造血: (ぞうけつ) - blood formation; blood making; hemopoiesis (haemopoiesis); hematosis (haematosis); hematopoiesis (haematopoiesis)
造血幹細胞: (ぞうけつかんさいぼう) - hematopoietic stem cell (haematopoietic); hemopoietic stem cell (haemopoietic)
造血機能: (ぞうけつきのう) - hemopoietic function; haemopoietic function; hematopoietic function; haematopoietic function; blood-forming functions
造血系細胞: (ぞうけつけいさいぼう) - hematopoietic cell
造言飛語: (ぞうげんひご) - (yoji) wild rumor; wild rumour
造詣の奥深さ: (ぞうけいのおくぶかさ) - deep knowledge
造語成分: (ぞうごせいぶん) - constituents of compound word
造酒屋: (つくりざかや) - sake brewer; sake brewery
造面: (ぞうめん) - rectangular bugaku mask made of thick paper and white silk with facial features drawn on it
逢い引き: (あいびき) - (secret) date; clandestine meeting; assignation; tryst; rendezvous
逢う: (あう) - (逢う is often used for close friends, etc. and may be associated with drama or pathos; 遭う may have an undesirable nuance) to meet/to encounter/to see; (esp. 遭う when in kanji) to have an accident/to have a bad experience
逢うは別れの始め: (あうはわかれのはじめ) - those who meet must part (suggesting the transient nature of this life); we meet only to part
逢う魔が刻: (おうまがとき) - twilight; time for disasters (similar to 'the witching hour' but not midnight)
逢う魔が時: (おうまがとき) - twilight; time for disasters (similar to 'the witching hour' but not midnight)
逢う魔ヶ刻: (おうまがとき) - twilight; time for disasters (similar to 'the witching hour' but not midnight)
逢う魔ヶ時: (おうまがとき) - twilight; time for disasters (similar to 'the witching hour' but not midnight)
逢わせる: (あわせる) - to make (someone) to meet/to let (someone) meet; to expose to/to subject to
逢引: (あいびき) - (secret) date; clandestine meeting; assignation; tryst; rendezvous
逢引き: (あいびき) - (secret) date; clandestine meeting; assignation; tryst; rendezvous
逢魔が刻: (おうまがとき) - twilight; time for disasters (similar to 'the witching hour' but not midnight)
逢魔が時: (おうまがとき) - twilight; time for disasters (similar to 'the witching hour' but not midnight)
逢魔ヶ刻: (おうまがとき) - twilight; time for disasters (similar to 'the witching hour' but not midnight)
逢魔ヶ時: (おうまがとき) - twilight; time for disasters (similar to 'the witching hour' but not midnight)
連: (ren) - levar junto, dois resmas (de papel), 1000 folhas (de papel); estrofe, verso; tribo (em taxonomia); grupo, companhia, conjunto
連ちゃん: (レンチャン) - repeated events (meetings, drinking sessions, etc.)/series of events/streak; {mahj} (orig. meaning) extended game/successive games
連なり: (つらなり) - series (of something); range (e.g. of mountains)
連なる: (つらなる) - to extend/to stretch out/to stand in a row; to attend/to participate in; to enrol/to join
連ねる: (つらねる) - to line up/to put in a row; to add (to a group)/to accept (as a member of an organization, etc.)/to join (e.g. a list); to link/to put together/to string together (e.g. compliments)/to enumerate; to take along with/to bring with
連ぱつ: (れんぱつ) - running continuously; firing in rapid succession
連む: (つるむ) - to go with (a companion); to hang out with
連れしょん: (つれしょん) - going to the bathroom in a group; going off to urinate together
連れてくる: (つれてくる) - to bring someone along
連れて来る: (つれてくる) - to bring someone along
連れて行く: (つれてゆく) - to take someone (of lower status) along
連れる: (つれる) - to lead; to take (a person)
連れション: (つれション) - going to the bathroom in a group; going off to urinate together
連れ去る: (つれさる) - to take away; to kidnap
連れ合い: (つれあい) - one's husband; one's wife
連れ子: (つれこ) - child from previous marriage; child brought by a second spouse
連れ小便: (つれしょうべん) - going off to urinate together
連れ帰る: (つれかえる) - to bring (someone) back home; to take (someone) back home
連れ歩く: (つれあるく) - to walk with/to make someone tag along; to carry around (esp. a child)/to carry about
連れ添う: (つれそう) - to become a couple; to be man and wife; to be married to
連れ立つ: (つれだつ) - to accompany; to go with; to go together
連れ舞: (つれまい) - dance done by two persons or more
連れ込み: (つれこみ) - taking one's lover to a hotel
連れ込み宿: (つれこみやど) - traditional love hotel; traditional Japanese inn specially for couples
連れ込み旅館: (つれこみりょかん) - traditional love hotel; traditional Japanese inn specially for couples
連れ込む: (つれこむ) - to bring (somebody into a place)
連チャン: (レンチャン) - repeated events (meetings, drinking sessions, etc.)/series of events/streak; {mahj} (orig. meaning) extended game/successive games
連中: (れんぢゅう) - (familiar or derogatory) colleagues/company/a lot/those guys/group (of people); (れんじゅう, れんぢゅう only) troupe/company (of musicians)
連亘: (れんこう) - extending in a row
連休明け: (れんきゅうあけ) - end of consecutive holidays
連体: (れんたい) - (used in dictionaries)  pre-noun adjectival; adnominal adjective
連体修飾語: (れんたいしゅうしょくご) - modifier of a non-inflectable word
連体形: (れんたいけい) - participle adjective; attributive form
連体格: (れんたいかく) - genitive case; adnominal case
連体詞: (れんたいし) - pre-noun adjectival; adnominal adjective
連作: (れんさく) - planting a field with the same crop each year/repeated cultivation; collaborative literary work/story made up by several writers working on it in turn; series (of novels)/cycle (of poems, songs)/sequence
連係: (れんけい) - connection; linking; linkage; link
連係プレー: (れんけいプレー) - {baseb} good teamwork play
連係編集: (れんけいへんしゅう) - linkage editing
連係編集プログラム: (れんけいへんしゅうプログラム) - linker; linking program
連写: (れんしゃ) - continuous shooting (photography); consecutive shooting; rapid shooting
連写速度: (れんしゃそくど) - continuous shooting speed (photo)
連判: (れんぱん) - joint seal or signature
連判状: (れんばんじょう) - jointly sealed covenant
連動性: (れんどうせい) - linkage; interrelation; relationship
